jvx.geom

Class PwCleanMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.object.PsObject
      • jvx.project.PjWorkshop
        • jvx.geom.PwCleanMesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, PsUpdateIf, PjWorkshopIf

    public class PwCleanMesh
extends PjWorkshop
    Utility programs for cleaning and correcting a polyhedral mesh. Contains static functions to operate on a PgElementSet.

    Identification of vertices incorporated into loader manager jv.loader.PgLoader. Therefore functionality to identify vertices moved from jvx.geom.PwCleanMesh to jv.geom.PuCleanMesh.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static int identifyVertices(PgPointSet geom,

      • splitBySelection

        public static PgElementSet splitBySelection(PgElementSet geom)
        Split a surface into selected and not selected part. All selected elements, identified by a tag 
         geom.hasTagElement(i, PsObject.IS_SELECTED)
        are removed from the original geometry and added to the new returned geometry.

        Currently, all unused vertices remain in original geometry. The new returned geometry contains only used vertices.

        Returns:
        element set containing all selected elements.

      • joinPolygons

        public static void joinPolygons(PgPolygonSet polygonSet)
        Join polygons of a polygon set to new polygons. The new polygons will not have ending points of other polygons as inner points and inner points will not have the tag PsObject.IS_SELECTED, and at no vertex will be exactly two ends of polygons, except the ends of a closed polygon.

      • getNumNonManifoldVertices

        public static int getNumNonManifoldVertices(PgElementSet geom)
        Count vertices with more than one coherent link of adjacent elements. This method requires correct neighbourhood information.

      • makeManifold

        public static void makeManifold(PgElementSet geom)
        Adapts the given input surface to be manifold, i.e. the stars of all vertices become topological disks.

        This is the order of actions, in which all degenerations should disappear:
        [1] remove element degenerations:
        - every element will have at least three vertices, the vertices of an element are pairwise distinct. When this is done, element - edge incidences are well defined.
        [2] remove non-manifold edges:
        - every edge is edge of exactly two elements (then it is an interior edge) or of exactly one element (then it is a boundary edge).
        [3] compute neighbourhood.
        - after [1] and [2], all edges of elements are o.k., each edge is incident to one element or to two distinct elements; so the PgElementSet.makeNeighbour() method will produce intact neighbourhood information.
        [4] split non-manifold vertices:
        - each vertex will be contained in exactly one ring-neighbourhood of faces (may be open or closed) or it is an unused vertex. this method needs correct neighbourhood information, since it runs on PgVertexStar.
        [5] remove neighbourhood degenerations:
        - a pair of adjacent elements will have exactly two common vertices (the end points of the unique common edge), other pairs of elements may have at most one common vertex. This method needs correct neighbourhood information, since it also runs on PgVertexStar.

      • splitNonManifoldVertices

        public static PiVector splitNonManifoldVertices(PgElementSet geom)
        Search for vertices with more than one coherent link of adjacent elements and disconnect those to good discrete manifold vertices, each belonging to one of the element links. This method requires correct neighbourhood information.
        Returns:
        PiVector containing the index map new vertex index-> old vertex index.

      • markBoundaryEndPoints

        public void markBoundaryEndPoints()
        Mark all start and end vertices of a PgElementSets boundary Polygons with the tag PsObject.IS_SELECTED. This is a non-static call for PjWorkshop use.

      • markBoundaryEndPoints

        public static void markBoundaryEndPoints(PgElementSet geom)
        Mark all start and end vertices of a PgElementSets boundary Polygons with the tag PsObject.IS_SELECTED.

      • markCornerVertices

        public void markCornerVertices(double angle)
        Search in a PgElementSet for boundary vertices with surface angle less than a threshold value (in degrees) and mark those with the tag PsObject.IS_SELECTED. Vertices already marked get not unmarked. This is a non-static call for PjWorkshop use.

      • markCornerVertices

        public static void markCornerVertices(PgElementSet geom,
                      double angle)
        Search in a PgElementSet for boundary vertices with surface angle less than a threshold value (in degrees) and mark those with the tag PsObject.IS_SELECTED. Vertices already marked get not unmarked.

      • getParameterLines

        public static PgPolygonSet getParameterLines(PgElementSet geom)
        Deprecated. method is moved to PwParameterLines.
        Get parameter lines of a PgElementSet, extracted from its combinational properties, as a new PgPolygonSet. Existing boundary polygons are used as parameter lines along the boundary; if no boundary polygons exist, all boundary edges are returned as parameter lines of only one single edge.

      • refineParameterLines

        public static void refineParameterLines(PgElementSet geom,
                        int grade)
        Deprecated. method is moved to PwParameterLines.
        Refine the parameter lines of an PgElementSet by DLG refinement. Attention, the PgElementSet will have bad neighbourhood properties afterwards: If an edge gets refined, the adjacent elements will have each other as neighbours more than once.

      • cutAlongPolygonSet

        public static void cutAlongPolygonSet(PgElementSet geom,
                      PgPolygonSet polygonSet)
        Cut a surface along polygons consisting of element edges, duplicate all vertices along this polygons, and set the polygons as additional boundary polygons.

        HACK: Method expects the polygonSet indices to be the indices of elementSet vertices...

      • closeHoles

        public static void closeHoles(PgElementSet geom)
        Close all holes in a geometry by the triangles that are generated by the triangulation of boundary polygons. Boundary polygons will be deleted, as there are no boundaries any longer.

      • getNumNonManifoldEdges

        public static int getNumNonManifoldEdges(PgElementSet geom)
        Count non-manifold edges contained in the geometry.

      • removeNonManifoldEdges

        public static void removeNonManifoldEdges(PgElementSet geom)
        Remove non-manifold edges from the geometry. This method will insert new vertices upon non-manifold edges, so these degenerations are removed combinatorially; the geometry will not not be changed.

      • removeNeighbourhoodDegenerations

        public static int removeNeighbourhoodDegenerations(PgElementSet geom)
        Detect pairs of elements, which have common vertices, which are not connected by a common edge. Split those elements. Correct neighbourhood information is required, element degenerations shall be removed beforehand, all vertices are supposed to be proper 2-manifold vertices.

      • getNumNeighbourhoodDegenerations

        public static int getNumNeighbourhoodDegenerations(PgElementSet geom)
        Count pairs of elements, which have common vertices, which are not connected by a common edge. Correct neighbourhood information is required, element degenerations shall be removed beforehand, all vertices are supposed to be proper 2-manifold vertices.

        Split all selected elements by inserting center vertices.

      • centralSplit

        public static void centralSplit(PgElementSet geom,
                int elIndex)
        Split a single element of a PgElementSet into triangles by inserting a center vertex.

      • checkManifold

        public static boolean checkManifold(PgElementSet geom,
                    boolean bMessage)
        Check if a given element set is a 2D manifold.
        Parameters:
        geom - Geometry.
        bMessage - Flag to send messages to the JavaView console.
        Returns:
        True, if geom is a manifold surface.

      • removeHangingNodes

        public static boolean removeHangingNodes(PgElementSet geom)
        Remove hanging nodes: Find adjacent boundary edges with opposite direction and insert the not common end point of the shorter edge upon the longer edge, split the resp. face. Edges of vanishing length are not handled, those may be removed by the identifyVertices method.

        This method will kill all those simple case that consist of a collinear closed three-vertex boundary; if longer collinear closed boundaries are in a geometry, they should disappear with repeated calls of this method.

        Returns:
        true if a hanging node was removed, false if no one was found.

      • removeHangingNodes

        public static boolean removeHangingNodes(PgElementSet geom,
                         double maxAngle,
                         boolean splitElements)
        Remove hanging nodes: Find adjacent boundary edges with opposite direction and insert the not common end point of the shorter edge upon the longer edge, split the resp. face. Edges of vanishing length are not handled, those may be removed by the identifyVertices method.

        This method will kill all those simple case that consist of a collinear closed three-vertex boundary; if longer collinear closed boundaries are in a geometry, they should disappear with repeated calls of this method.

        Parameters:
        maxAngle - Two vectors are assumed to be parallel if the angle between them is smaller than maxAngle (in degrees).
        splitElements - Split elements instead of appending an existing element.
        Returns:
        true if a hanging node was removed, false if no one was found.

      • collapseEdgesBetweenSelectedElements

        public static void collapseEdgesBetweenSelectedElements(PgElementSet geom)
        Collapse edges between pairs of selected elements - elements will be unselected, so no element will be collapsed at more than one edge.

      • collapseEdge

        public static int collapseEdge(PgElementSet geom,
               int elementIndex,
               int localIndex)
        Collapse a single edge in a PgElementSet.
        Parameters:
        geom - The PgElementSet.
        elementIndex - Index of element containing the edge to be collapsed.
        localIndex - Local index in the element (numbered as in neighbour).

      • computeElementNormal

        public static void computeElementNormal(PgElementSet geom,
                        int elementIndex)
        Compute an element normal anew.

      • computeElementNormal

        public static PdVector computeElementNormal(PdVector[] vertex)
        Compute normal of an element, given by its vertices in cyclic order.

      • splitCurvedPolygons

        public static void splitCurvedPolygons(PgPolygonSet polySet,
                       double threshold)
        Split polygons, until all polygons satisfy a straghtness criterion: All interiour vertices are sorted by their distance to the straight line between start and end point. If the ratio of distance and length of the line between the start and end point is greater than the given threshold parameter, the polygon will be split at the farest vertex.

      • flipEdgesBetweenSelectedElements

        public static void flipEdgesBetweenSelectedElements(PgElementSet geom)
        Flip edges between pairs of selected elements - elements will be unselected, so no element will be flipped at more than one edge.

      • flipEdge

        public static void flipEdge(PgElementSet geom,
            int elementIndex,
            int localIndex)
        Flip a single edge of a PgElementSet.

      • mergeSelectedElements

        public static void mergeSelectedElements(PgElementSet geom)
        Merge pairs of neighbouring selected elements.

      • joinElements

        public static void joinElements(PgElementSet elementSet,
                int index,
                int localIndex)
        Join two elements. The indicated element will be replaced by the joined element, the neighbour element will be tagged as PsObject.IS_DELETED.

      • rotateStarsSelectedVertices

        public static void rotateStarsSelectedVertices(PgElementSet elementSet)
        Rotate Vertex stars of all vertices tagged by PsObject.IS_SELECTED.
        Parameters:
        elementSet - The geometry to be modified.

      • rotateStar

        public static void rotateStar(PgElementSet elementSet,
              int index,
              int elIndex)
        Rotate a vertex star - each edge connecting the center vertex to a vertex in the link will be moved to the next vertex in the vertex star's boundary. Method does up to now work for closed vertex stars only.
        Parameters:
        elementSet - The geometry to be modified.
        index - Index of the vertex star to be rotated.
        elIndex - Index of an adjacent element, may be -1.

      • removeSelectedVerticesAndFill

        public static void removeSelectedVerticesAndFill(PgElementSet elementSet)
        Remove all selected vertices and fill the holes by new elements given by the neighbouring vertices.
        Parameters:
        elementSet - The geometry to be modified.

      • removeVertexAndFill

        public static void removeVertexAndFill(PgElementSet elementSet,
                       int index,
                       int elIndex)
        Remove a vertex and fill the hole by a new element given by all neighbouring vertices.
        Parameters:
        elementSet - The geometry to be modified.
        index - Index of the vertex to be removed
        elIndex - Index of an adjacent element, may be -1.

      • removeValence3Vertices

        public static void removeValence3Vertices(PgElementSet elementSet)
        Valence 3 vertices are removed by edge collapse. Since in this case the edge collapse decreases the valence of the other vertex it might be necessary to call the method several times.

      • identifyMarkedVertices

        public static void identifyMarkedVertices(PgElementSet elementSet)
        Identify Selected Vertices, the position of the new vertex will be averaged from the identified vertices.

      • scrambleElements

        public static void scrambleElements(PgElementSet elementSet)
        Change the internal order of indices of the vertices in all triangles by random to get arbitrary examples for testing the algorithm.

      • removeSmallAngles

        public static void removeSmallAngles(PgElementSet geom,
                     double eps,
                     boolean bRemove)
        Clean mesh from small angles i.e. flip edges opposite to angles close to PI, collapse edges opposite of angles close to 0.
        Parameters:
        geom - Triangulated geometry.
        eps - Threshold in radians.
        bRemove - Flag whether or not to remove elements/vertices marked as PsObject.IS_DELETED.

                   int numSamples)
